casebody.data:
643 A.2d 382 ATTORNEY GRIEVANCE COMMISSION OF MARYLAND v. Allan G. SLAN. Misc. Docket (Subtitle BV) No. 11,

Sept. Term, 1994.

Court of Appeals of Maryland. June 24, 1994.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the Consent to Disbarment from the practice of law filed by Allan G. Sian, in accordance with Maryland Rule BV 12d2, and the written recommendation of Bar Counsel, it is this 24th day of June, 1994

ORDERED, by the Court of Appeals of Maryland, that Allan G. Sian be, and he is hereby, disbarred by consent from the further practice of law in the State of Maryland; and it is further

ORDERED, that the Clerk of this Court shall strike the name of Allan G. Sian from the register of attorneys, and pursuant to Maryland Rule BV 13, shall certify that fact to the Trustees of the Clients’ Security Trust Fund and the clerks of all judicial tribunals in the State.
